mapper.update: update d_safe_insp set safeinspid=safeinspid ,insptime=#{insptime} ,organiser=#{organiser} ,hazard=#{hazard} ,measures=#{measures} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where safeinspid=#{safeinspid}

update d_safe_insp set safeinspid=safeinspid ,insptime=#{insptime} ,organiser=#{organiser} ,hazard=#{hazard} ,measures=#{measures} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where 1=1 and safeinspid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and safeinspid =#{Where_Id} and safeinspid=#{Where_safeinspid} and insptime=#{Where_insptime} and organiser=#{Where_organiser} and hazard=#{Where_hazard} and measures=#{Where_measures} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.insptime "insptime", t.organiser "organiser", t.hazard "hazard", t.measures "measures", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_insp t where safeinspid=#{safeinspid}

select t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.insptime "insptime", t.organiser "organiser", t.hazard "hazard", t.measures "measures", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_insp t where 1=1 and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.insptime=#{insptime} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.hazard=#{hazard} and t.measures=#{measures} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.insptime "insptime", t.organiser "organiser", t.hazard "hazard", t.measures "measures", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_insp t where 1=1 and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.insptime=#{insptime} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.hazard=#{hazard} and t.measures=#{measures} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
mapper.delete: delete from d_safe_insp where 1=1 and safeinspid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and safeinspid =#{Where_Id} and safeinspid=#{Where_safeinspid} and insptime=#{Where_insptime} and organiser=#{Where_organiser} and hazard=#{Where_hazard} and measures=#{Where_measures} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.safeinspid "safeinspid", t.insptime "insptime", t.organiser "organiser", t.hazard "hazard", t.measures "measures", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_safe_insp t where 1=1 and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.insptime=#{insptime} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.hazard=#{hazard} and t.measures=#{measures} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select count(*) from d_safe_insp t where 1=1 and t.safeinspid=#{safeinspid} and t.safeinspid!=#{NoId} and t.insptime=#{insptime} and t.organiser=#{organiser} and t.hazard=#{hazard} and t.measures=#{measures} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
